metadata.title: CVE-2019-16687 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr 9.0.5 has stored XSS in a User Profile in a Signature section tocard.php. A user with the "Create/modify other users, groups andpermissions" privilege can inject script and can also achieve privilegeescalation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
